alert.note: Alert for Northeast Siskiyou and Northwest Modoc Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued June 15 at 4:46AM PDT until June 15 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Temperatures in the lower to mid 30s will result in frost formation. Locally, temperatures are expected to drop into the upper 20s for areas in northern Klamath County, mainly north of Chiloquin. * WHERE...This includes most valley areas east of the Cascades, including the Klamath Basin near Klamath Falls and Tulelake, Sprague River, Bly, Chiloquin, Chemult, Silver Lake, Lakeview. This also includes surrounding higher terrain. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 8 AM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Siskiyou and Northwest Modoc Counties
